Title Tibetan: theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos
Author: byams pa (Maitreya to Asanga)
Notes: Commentary Title: theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos snying po'i don mngon sum lam gyi bshad srol dang sbyar ba'i rnam par 'grel pa phyir mi ldog pa seng ge'i nga ro
Technical Notes: Commentary Author: 'jam mgon kong sprul blo gros mtha' yas
